publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3306 Karen Whitefield: Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health - 25th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health (LAMH) on reaching its 25th anniversary; recognises the substantial commitment that it has made towards improving the mental health of the people of Lanarkshire through training and development, such as staff training in Scotland’s Mental Health First Aid, social inclusion and equality and diversity, and congratulates LAMH on its achievements in promoting mental health at work and on its achieving the Mental Health and Wellbeing Commendation Award.
S3M-3306 Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 26 January 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*

S3M-3306 Karen Whitefield: Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health - 25th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health (LAMH) on reaching its 25th anniversary; recognises the substantial commitment that it has made towards improving the mental health of the people of Lanarkshire through training and development, such as staff training in Scotland’s Mental Health First Aid, social inclusion and equality and diversity, and congratulates LAMH on its achievements in promoting mental health at work and on its achieving the Mental Health and Wellbeing Commendation Award. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alex Neil, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3306 Lanarkshire Association for Mental Health - 25th Anniversary (lodged on 26 January 2009) Tom McCabe*
